website_summaries.verdict: The AAXA M5 Mini Projector is a good choice if you need a highly portable projector strictly for data presentations, as its video is usable only for very short clips.
cons: Poor video quality, with oversaturated colors and frequent rainbow artifacts

customer_reviews.title: excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: i bought this not for business but for watching movies at home. so, i cannot rate it as a business projector. it's bright. i can see it even when it's bright out doors. what's missing: zoom. it's got a superfast lens so if you want a small image, you can forget it, if you don't have space for close to the wall, or a big wall, forget it. the battery is sensational. i watched an entire f1 race on the battery alone and no fan. excellent!!! i like it a lot. i'd give it 4.5 stars if i could but i am left between 5 and 4 so, it gets 5.
customer_reviews.author: surface plasmons

customer_reviews.title: Not dependable
customer_reviews.text: Pro: remarkably bright, even in full daylight. Con: very noisy fans. Power supply cords are too loose to be dependable, even the slightest movement disconnects the plug from the projector and the power brick from the mains, can't be trusted to actually be plugged in when needed.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: 4.5 -5 for the focus wheel
customer_reviews.text: Nice and bright ,very quiet even on boost mode(not sure what other reviews are complaining about) very good adjustable color, useable in the day.focus wheel is the only negative, it's a bit annoying. I'm very very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Gary S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Everything about the projector is excellent. Great quality and extremely convenient. The projector came with a case, remote, stand, and power cord. The cord is about 10'. The remote works best when pointed at the rear of the projector. The stand is not the best quality, but was a bonus to begin with. I would recommend a third party, more durable, stand. Overall well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Great little projector but I needed it to project larger
customer_reviews.text: It actually really works well and is clear. But I needed to use it for a meeting of 30 people so those at the back couldn't read the small print on the screen. Depends on what you want to use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great picture!
customer_reviews.text: Great for work presentations! Easy to use and high quality image for such a small device! Image is best if paired with a projector screen; walls can be difficult to focus if bumpy or has dark color!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: I think I got a lemon
customer_reviews.text: There is something wrong with this projector. The projection has lines through the words. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ash & Abby

customer_reviews.title: We love this projector and were very impressed with how easy ...
customer_reviews.text: We love this projector and were very impressed with how easy it was to use. For the conference we had of 30+ people it was bright for everyone in the room and we didn't have to completely turn off the lights. It is very portable and comes with a nice case.
customer_reviews.author: B H

customer_reviews.title: Great projector...and...
customer_reviews.text: The projector is lovely; worked well with light on in room, great picture. Remote almost impossible to use though
customer_reviews.author: C. Rosenholtz

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to use with my lectures and presentations in the classroom and at gatherings and this projector works fine for me. I was surprised at how bright the images were. I expected less.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: same battery issue as the other AAXA product
customer_reviews.text: I'm just wondering if anyone can really use it for 70 minutes, mine is out of battery in 30 minutes. The noise is also quite loud. The only good thing about it is it's really bright.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Bright on screen in a very bright room from about 6 feet away. I use it for PowerPoint Presentations.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Daniels

customer_reviews.title: I sent it back after one
customer_reviews.text: Lamevat best. Spend the extra money to get the better model.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hayes

customer_reviews.title: It seems to be a good product! The brightness is very good for its ...
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be a good product! The brightness is very good for its size. Has good connectivity. The speakers are pretty weak, but there is a jack for an external speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Odie Goddard

customer_reviews.title: I love this projector
customer_reviews.text: I love this projector. it rivals the monsters you have seen and more. It fits in your hand and is surprisingly cooler than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Projector with Keystone correction
customer_reviews.text: Just received - Initial review This little Projector is perfect for my needs. I just received it and turned it on. Perfect - The brightness is perfect for small teaching situations and smaller conference rooms. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: David Kassemos

customer_reviews.title: Good quality batter powered projector
customer_reviews.text: The resolution is pretty good and it is more than enough brightness for my needs. Very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: hailey chiang

customer_reviews.title: It was not adequate for a large room either like a small hotel room for 50 people
customer_reviews.text: We sent this back as it did not meet our needs for a traveling multi-person use projector. It was too complicated for people to figure out how to use. It was not adequate for a large room either like a small hotel room for 50 people.
customer_reviews.author: Bobette Anne Frye

customer_reviews.title: it is as portable and a much better image quality
customer_reviews.text: Image was not bright enough for my purposes I spend a couple hundred more for an Epson powerlite, it is as portable and a much better image quality.
customer_reviews.author: SDH

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement.
customer_reviews.text: What a terrible little projector. It feels cheap and isn't even close to 900 lumens when plugged in. I'm pretty sure my ZTE SPRO 2 is brighter than this @ 200 lumens and has much better color accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher G.

customer_reviews.title: Works great if you use it for what it is and NOT what it isn't
customer_reviews.text: Works great if you use it for what it is and NOT what it isn't.
customer_reviews.author: FmrAnimalTech

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Good little machine. I bought it for socially-distanced movie nights. We wanted to have friends over (no more than 10) and enjoy their company outdoors while not risking anyone's health. This has worked like a charm. We've watched several outdoor movies. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: C Dub

customer_reviews.title: Received unit in an opened box.
customer_reviews.text: Package received in a box with a broken seal and packaging removed and replaced. Returning immediately, as I am unsure if this item is actually new or refurbished. Will update review when I receive a NEW projector in a SEALED box.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Bright and good for business meetings
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for business meetings and it's a great projector for the price. Projects a large image with a very clear picture and the battery makes it easy to set up as there's no need to fuss around with cords or worry about an outlet nearby. Set up is qucik and simple if you want to connect to a laptop as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really liked it, but wanted something a bit brighter
customer_reviews.text: this is my second AAXA. The first was the p300. I really liked it, but wanted something a bit brighter. Everything worked fine with the p300. The M5 meets my need except for some very irritating reason it will not let me project in presenter view using PowerPoint. This was not a problem in the p300. As i main use is teaching i find this a deal breaker. Tech support could not help. Sad, but i will have to return it and i have a trip coming up in which i really need it.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Walker

customer_reviews.title: Very bright!!
customer_reviews.text: This projector is great. very high brightness with a crisp projected image. Fan noise wasn't an issue for me as built-in speakers were loud enough. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: World's Brightest Mini Projector
customer_reviews.text: Excited to buy it...finally bought it and found it awesome... the best thing is that it does not get heated even if I run it for couple of hours. Picture quality is awesome...Used external speakers to enjoy the movie :) Finally I owe an projector with best technology :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small in size but great quality
customer_reviews.text: We use this for school use the small size is very practical and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

product_meta.title: AAXA M5 Mini Portable Business Projector with Built-in Rechargeable Battery, 900 Lumens High Brightness, Native WXGA HD Resolution, Onboard Media Player, 20,000 Hours LED
product_meta.description: AAXA M5 Pico Projector - Producing 900 LED lumens in "bright" mode and 500 lumens in battery mode the M5 can project up to a 70" screen size in moderately lit rooms and more than a 10 foot theater size screen in rooms with controlled lighting. Measuring just 6" x 6" x 1.8" and weighing in at a 1.95lbs this projector is a true micro projector that fits easily in a small briefcase purse or laptop bag. Compatible with Smartphones ( iPhone , iPad, Android ), Gaming Consoles ( Xbox , PS4 ), Amazon Fire TV, or any HDMI compatible devices. Prefect for camping, outdoor movie nights, travel, home and business use cases.
feature_bullets: HIGH BRIGHTNESS 900 LUMENS - Powered by 4th generation DLP optical engine & 20,000 hour LED light source with Vibrant Color Technology. Never need a bulb change.
WXGA HD NATIVE RESOLUTION - High-Definition 1280x800 Native Resolution (WXGA) with a Max Input Resolution of 1080p.
WIDE RANGE OF CONNECTIVITY - HDMI, VGA, 3.5mm Aux Out, Composite A/V along with Micro SD and USB readers. Built-in Speaker and Onboard Media Player for Direct File Playback.
PORTABLE SIZE, BATTERY POWERED- Ultra portable at 6" x 6" x 1.8" and weighs only 1.95 lbs with an onboard premium lithium-ion battery that provides 70+ minutes of runtime.
PERFECT FOR BUSINESS AND HOME USE - with up to 150" projection (in low light conditions). Includes remote and mini tripod for easy setup and navigation.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars53 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
